metadata.abstract: Â© 2019 The Author(s) . Published by Oxford University Press. All rights reserved.Performing highly parallelized preprocessing of methylation array data using Python can accelerate data preparation for downstream methylation analyses, including large scale production-ready machine learning pipelines. We present a highly reproducible, scalable pipeline (PyMethylProcess) that can be quickly set-up and deployed through Docker and PIP.
metadata.title: PyMethylProcess - Convenient high-throughput preprocessing workflow for DNA methylation data
